projects.title: Word Level Language Identification
projects.description: Nowadays, user-generated texts in Indonesian especially that is taken from social media are written in code-mixed language. For more in depth analysis in language identification, we can detect the language in word level. This experiment demonstrates the NLP model for word level language identification using Conditional Random Field (CRF) method. The model was trained using code mixed Indonesian, Javanese, and English twitter data developed by [1]. The trained CRF model got about 90% accuracy, able to differenciate the language for each word but still weak on detecting the mixed language. The use if BERT-Based model has the possibility to improve the language detection.
references: [1] Hidayatullah, Ahmad Fathan. (2022). Code-mixed Indonesian-Javanese-English Twitter Dataset (Version v1) [Data set]. Zenodo. https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.7567573

projects.title: Climate Change Media Analysis
projects.description: This is my collaborative projects while I was pursuing my master degree. I was assigned to do the media analysis on climate-related news from the Indonesian media outlets. I created this dashboard to show the content analysis of climate-related news taken from Indonesian mass media. There are two analysis, topic modelling with Bertopic and text network visualization with textnets. I used topic modelling to uncover the topics covered by the media, and text network visualization to get the deeper insight on what mostly talk about in the ceratin topic.

projects.title: Mancala
projects.description: This was a group project from one of AI principal course. We were challenged to create a project that implemented greedy algorithm, hence we created a Mancala game. Mancala is a turn-based strategy board game with small stones and a hole. The objective is usually to capture all or some set of the opponent's pieces. In this game, we develop the opponent agent by implementing greedy algorithm, so that the agent were able to decide which stone should be taken from the pit to get the maximum score. We used streamlit so the UI was not as good as expected.
